attributes.action: UK should create a new free trade zone if the EU tries to bully or punish the UK
attributes.additional_details: If the UK Government creates a new free trade zone then we also call upon the UK Government to invite other EU member states and Norway, Iceland and Switzerland to join.
attributes.background: The UK has democratically voted to leave the EU but the response of some in the EU is to suggest that the EU should bully or punish the UK for its democratic decision to leave. This Petition calls upon the UK Government to create a new free trade zone if the EU seeks to punish the UK
